GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single object of an article by article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a single article

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a single object of a user by username

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for an article and responds with the stored comment

comment.body: Lorum Ipsum Doughnuts Cupcake nutella dolar marshmallow
comment.author: username

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: modifies the vote value for a single article and responds with the updated article

article.title: Book title
article.author: username
article.body: Lorum Ipsum Doughnuts Cupcake nutella dolar marshmallow

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: modifies the vote value for a single comment and responds with the updated comment

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comment.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes a comment by the comment_id
